name: ai-programming-book-builder
description: A tool to merge AI programming book content into a single markdown file

scripts.convert:styled: mkdir -p output && pandoc "chapters/01.1-什么是AI编程.md" -o "output/temp.docx" -f markdown -t docx --standalone && python3 fix-docx-styles.py "output/temp.docx" "output/01.1-什么是AI编程-styled.docx" && rm "output/temp.docx"
scripts.convert:test: mkdir -p output && pandoc "create-reference-doc.md" -o "output/temp-test.docx" -f markdown -t docx --standalone && python3 fix-docx-styles.py "output/temp-test.docx" "output/样式测试文档-styled.docx" && rm "output/temp-test.docx"
scripts.debug:styles: mkdir -p output && pandoc "create-reference-doc.md" -o "output/debug-test.docx" -f markdown -t docx --standalone && python3 debug-docx-styles.py "output/debug-test.docx"
scripts.convert:all-styled: mkdir -p output && for file in chapters/*.md; do basename="$(basename "$file" .md)"; pandoc "$file" -o "output/temp-$basename.docx" -f markdown -t docx --standalone && python3 fix-docx-styles.py "output/temp-$basename.docx" "output/$basename-styled.docx" && rm "output/temp-$basename.docx"; done
